reviewText: I don,t speak Italian but the story was fairly easy to follow..porn star gets cancer but struggles ahead with life fighting her illness every step.....the nude scenes were frankly eye popping even for a european movie....the movie appeared to have little depth to it

it is very rare to find a good story with good acting that is based on the world of pornography...yes the movie is pretty explicit with graphic nudity and the goings on of filming porn...the main star Elisabetta Cavalloti does a pretty good job playing the lead...and you see lots of her too...but while explicit there is no full on penetration of the vagina shown...there are erect penises, vulvas, fellatio, & some girl/girl action which I feel are essential to the story line and thus are an integral part to the enjoyment of the movie...
